attributes.action: Stop the composing site being built at Arkwright Town in Derbyshire.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Composting site is coming to Arkwright. Derbyshire County Council have decided to go ahead with building the site at Arkwright despite over a thousand people signing a petition against it. It will mean around 40 thousand tonnes of waste a year possibly going into our area. A statement from Derbyshire County Council... says... 'After considering all the evidence' they decided to approve the application......

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Derbyshire County Council.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
